Message:
...Finding yarn that would make
the perfect scarf for Big Sis
is much harder than I thought.

Oh, wait! In that gift basket,
I see some yarn...
It’s pure white, like snow,
and its color’s so gentle.

It’s exactly like Big Sis...
Yup, that’s the one!

“That gift basket’s the prize
for winning the contest.”

Out of the blue,
a lady standing nearby
started talking to me.

and the person who can make
the most heartwarming gift will
be rewarded with that gift basket.”

In other words,
I can get the yarn
if I win the contest.
If that’s what it takes...!
